$ORCL New Press Release:  
  
City of Tampa Redesigns Staff Operations with Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications 
  
The City of Tampa, one of Florida's largest municipalities, has upgraded its systems and operations with the Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite. With Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Oracle Fusion Cloud Human Capital Management (HCM), Tampa has been able to strengthen its IT security, reduce costs, and streamline employee tasks by improving its finance and HR processes. With the newly freed up time and resources, Tampa's staff has been able to dedicate more time to directly serving citizens.
